title: Game Bugged - Can't join or make parties
body: When attempting to make a party or join one, the game bugs out and you can't see all the party members or start the queue. You can only play solo. This is for all game modes as well, but it seems none of the Riot staff have even noticed yet. Not sure if its only OCE or all servers.

replies.body: Well my friends and i managed to find a work around, Make a lobby doesnt matter if its aram ranked etc, have everyone join then change the game mode to whatever you want to play then have everyone leave and rejoin, then all other players must pick their roles before the host picks theirs otherwise it wont work, once every has picked roles the host can then pick and start q, this process must be repeated each time a game is finished :(

Can confirm that this works:

1. Make an ARAM que and whole party joins
2. Change Gamemode to desired gamemode
3. Everyone leave (including lobby owner) 
4. Create your game in gamemode you changed too
5. Join que 

<3
NOTE i did edit the first comment that you need to repeat the whole process after every game, well for my group we had to dont know about everyone else

Hi folks

Thanks for reporting this.  Really a bummer to have this happen on a Friday eh :'(

I just want to let you know that Riot are aware of this issue and are working on a fix for it.  It is unclear if we'll be able to roll something out tonight at this stage, so it might be something we have to put up with for the evening.

Definitely have a look at the workarounds mentioned in the thread to get your games started.   Once the lobby is made and in queue, you should be good to go.


Cheers!
Mindstar

Thanks!  I'm sure they will.  Weekends are awesome!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

This bug is still happening, when I Open the client, it says my friends are in parties with 2/undefined. This has been happening for a while now, but now it seems to be permanent. Persisted through the most recent patch today or yesterday. 
This is a screenshot of my client.(https://web.500px.com/photo/1009640799)
help me i have the same problem red f***** triangle HEEEEEEEEEEELP
help please i cant create lobby and i can not join neither f****ck
Have this issue too and can't see anything about it wtf! It's friday night!

Switching lobbies will temp fix it. Everytime someone joins/changes roles etc, just change lobbies and it'll reset the party status. Keep doing it until you can queue!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Thank you!
Can confirm this is still broken
how did you fix it ?
same problem, i have download game 3 times and it still now working

Hi Guys,

Found some what a solution to play with your duo in ranked;

Step 1: Open party invites
Step 2: Let your friend jump in the queue with you (dont select roles yet)
Step 3: Close Invite 
Step 4: Select Roles
Step 5: Queue up

Thank me by popping in the stream :D
[here is the link to my stream ](https://mixer.com/RelentlessLIVE)
I'm having the same problem when inviting friends, I hope they fix this soon.

yeah, I'm having the same issue.

Don't get me wrong fellas, im all down for new skins and all but shouldn't the stability of the client be of higher priority??

only once and then it stopped working. its not just unexpected errors man, ive been watching tyler1 stream, and something that has constantly been asked for is the matchmaking fix. U literally get paired with people who clearly dont know how to play. Tyler asked riot about it and they said they are making progress....dude the season ends in two months and all of us have been constantly asking to fix the matchmaking and pairing system for at least 3 seasons. ive seen more skins come out in the past 3 years of this game than i have actual fixes for it. i dont know why riot keeps releasing skins instead of fixing so many and constantly questioned problems but its really irritating.  riot seriously if ANYONE is from the company is reading. Get it together and stop messing around with skins, actually listen to the public requests. no1 asks for prettier champs with nicer skins and if they do i can bet you anything in the world that what people want more is a balanced game, that doesnt crash, that has proper matchmaking  in terms of able players with non able players, a decently stable client etc. i climbed to plat 1 in las, and the server over there is horrible, ud think that over here things would be different, but honestly its the exact same if not worse. It really is the most irritating thing ive seen in a game that i have played for so long.
same!
same. it said i was on aram in a ranked match. next game queued up i cant see the timer, not sure its gonna queue pop
This is the same for me
